code: import{TOGGLEDEADLINE,TOGGLEURGENCY}from"../actions/toggleSortAction";var toggleSortReducer=function toggleSortReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:true;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case TOGGLEDEADLINE:return true;break;case TOGGLEURGENCY:return false;break;default:return state;}};export default toggleSortReducer;
